definition: not to see/not to meet/to have disappeared/to be missing
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
to turn a blind eye to/to ignore
(lit.) name not encountered in the classics/unknown (person)/nobody

pinyin: shen1 shou3 bu4 jian4 wu3 zhi3

definition: all black, no daylight (idiom); a world without justice
what remains unseen is deemed to be clean/what the eye doesn't see, the heart doesn't grieve over (idiom)
you don't release the hawk until you've seen the hare (idiom)/one doesn't act before one is sure to succeed
pinyin: bu4 jian4 tu4 zi5 bu4 sa1 ying1

definition: not found in the classics (idiom); unknown/unfounded/not authoritative
lit. not to shed a tear until one sees the coffin (idiom)/fig. refuse to be convinced until one is faced with grim reality
pinyin: bu4 jian4 guan1 cai5 bu4 luo4 lei4

definition: one day apart seems like three years (idiom)
pinyin: yi1 ri4 bu4 jian4 , ru2 ge2 san1 qiu1
bu4 jian4 yi1 dian3 zong1 ying3

definition: lit. Even if we don't see each other, don't give up and leave (idiom)/fig. Be sure to wait!/See you there!

sentences.english: The spring water is of dark green, deep and running all the year round.
sentences.chinese: 泉水碧綠凝重，深不見底，終年湧流不息。

sentences.english: This scenery is not very beautiful, but a picture of autumn.
sentences.chinese: 這景色不見得很美，卻是一幅秋日風情畫。

sentences.english: Thou annointest my day with pep; my mug runneth over.
sentences.chinese: 你宣告了我充沛的一天，一切的疲憊必然消失不見。

sentences.english: As it was dark, he stubbed his toe against the table leg.
sentences.chinese: 由於天暗看不見，他的腳趾碰到了桌子腳。

sentences.english: My garden was covered with so many butterflies that I could hardly see the flowers.
sentences.chinese: 我的花園裏飛舞着很多蝴蝶，我幾乎看不見花了。

sentences.english: My English-Chinese Dictionary has disappeared. Who could have taken it?
sentences.chinese: 我的葉英漢詞典曳不見了，誰可能把它拿走了呢？

sentences.english: Don't lack the ball about. Can't you see it is crowded here?
sentences.chinese: 不要亂踢球，你看不見這兒很擠嗎？

sentences.english: Suddenly the giddiness is gone, and I stare at the ground.
sentences.chinese: 突然那種恍惚不見了，我盯着地面。

sentences.english: Left to right and so on and so on cock not send red crown to the centipede, they come in person to discuss.
sentences.chinese: 公雞左等右等不見蜈蚣送紅冠來，就親自上門討要。

sentences.english: He was gone in a trice.
The boulders suddenly disappeared, giving way to a stretch of plain.
sentences.chinese: 突然大石塊不見了，前面是一片平地。

sentences.english: Wink at small faults; remember thousand has great ones.
sentences.chinese: 若對小錯誤視而不見，那你就會犯大錯。

sentences.english: The next day, Kenzo was killed and Akimi disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，健三被殺身亡，雅美也不見了蹤影。

sentences.english: Gorged with power, I grew blind to Pokemon being alive.
sentences.chinese: 因貪嗜權力，竟令小生對神奇寶貝之存活盲目不見。

sentences.english: At noon, Dorothy unlocked the rest-room door and discovered that he was gone.
sentences.chinese: 到了中午，託羅絲找開廁所的門，卻發現它不見了。

sentences.english: The surface of the sea seems to be an invisible membrane between the water and the air.
sentences.chinese: 海的表面似乎是隔在水與空氣間的一層看不見的薄膜。

definition: to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
